topic: Basic Body Parts: 头, 手, 脚
detailedSummary: Basic body parts in Chinese: tóu (head), shǒu (hand), jiǎo (foot), gē bo (arm), tuǐ (leg), yǎn jīng (eye), ěr duo (ear), bí zi (nose), zuǐ (mouth).
whyItMatters: Mastering Basic Body Parts: 头, 手, 脚 is essential for building a strong foundation in chinese - these basic concepts are the first building blocks for all future language learning.
